extendedInfo.description: Baby Gender will help you predict your baby's gender! You can now share your results via email! Based on the chinese baby calendar chart, we provide you a simply and fun app to help you predict your baby's gender or tell you which months to conceive to get the gender you want! To predict a baby's gender, simply enter your birthday and the month of conception! Want a specific gender? Simply enter your birthday and we will tell you which months to conceive to make it happen! Or just want to have fun and see how accurate our app is? Enter your birthday and month/year of conception, and see if the results match your children's gender! Have fun! Please note, you have to be between the ages of 18 and 45 to get a result. This app is for entertainment purposes and results are just predictions.

reviews.title: Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: My husband and I wanna have a beautiful baby girl but it keeps on for closing on me. A lot of people says this soon worked for them. Please fix it so I can use it than I\'ll rate it to a 5 star
reviews.author: Elizabeth Centerbar

reviews.title: Keeps Changing...
reviews.comment: I\'m trying to plan a pregnancy due to my health... For many months it said conceive in July and have a girl. Now all the sudden it\'s saying something different.
reviews.author: Brooke Miller

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Correct with all three of our kids plus my friends kids

reviews.title: Was wrong.

reviews.title: Wrong calculation
reviews.comment: They probably use the algorithm the wrong way. They are not using lunar calendar,  and the mom\'s age needs to add a year.  If you use other online app of Chinese gender chart, you will get different results.  Nice application with friendly interface though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app.

reviews.comment: Baby Gender

reviews.title: Fun but that\'s it
reviews.comment: It always gave me that it\'s a boy. Never a girl. And it didn\'t get me right and i\'m a girl.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wrong
reviews.comment: Predicted \'girl\' when I have a boy and \'boy\' when its a girl I\'m expecting...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WRONG!!!!
reviews.comment: For anyone who has looked into the Chinese gender chart, which this is based on, when you are born your age is actually 1 not 0!!! So therefore it\'s wrong!! It told me both my girls should be boys. When I did it with my \"Chinese age\" it came out both girls!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So Far So Good
reviews.comment: Tried it with my little bro it was right, my expected sibling is a girl it said hope its right. Now I\'m going to try me.
reviews.author: A Google User
